title: Ethical approval (IRB, IACUC) documents
dataVerified: Researcher names, study participants (anonymized), protocol details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: High-stakes human/animal subject protection. Domain binding verifies IRB/IACUC authority. Prevents fabricated ethical approvals. Long regulatory retention.
